User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the attendance tracking system.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches Firebase Auth UID).

roll.description: Roll number of the user (e.g., student ID).

role.description: Role of the user within the system (e.g., 'admin', 'viewer', 'disabled').

AttendanceSession.title: AttendanceSession
AttendanceSession.description: Represents a specific attendance session, typically associated with a class or event.

key.description: The unique key or code associated with this attendance session, often used in QR codes.

adminUid.description: Reference to User. Unique identifier of the admin who created the session.

createdAt.description: The time the session was created.

lat.description: Latitude of the location where the attendance session is valid.

lng.description: Longitude of the location where the attendance session is valid.

lateAfterMinutes.description: The number of minutes after which a student is marked as late.

AttendanceRecord.title: AttendanceRecord
AttendanceRecord.description: Represents a single attendance record for a user in a specific session.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. The 'userId' is the Firebase Authentication UID.

/sessions/current.description: Stores the current active attendance session. This is a single document.

/sessions/current/records/{userId}.description: Stores the live attendance records for each student in the currently active session.

/sessions/{sessionId}/records/{recordId}.description: Stores individual attendance records for a specific historical session.

/settings/attendance.description: Stores application-wide settings. There is only one document with id 'attendance' in this collection.
